name: otpinput
description: A React Native component for entering one-time passwords (OTP) with multiple input boxes. Each input value is centered in its box. Supports focus, blur, key press, and delete events.

value.name: value
value.description: Current OTP value as a string.

style.name: style
style.description: Custom style for the OTP input container.

boxStyle.name: boxStyle
boxStyle.description: Custom style for each OTP input box. To center the value, use { textAlign: 'center' }.

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description: Callback when the OTP value changes. Returns the new value as a string.

onFocus.name: onFocus
onFocus.description: Callback when an input box receives focus. Returns the index of the focused box.

onBlur.name: onBlur
onBlur.description: Callback when an input box loses focus. Returns the index of the blurred box.

onKeyPress.name: onKeyPress
onKeyPress.description: Callback when a key is pressed in any input box. Returns the key pressed and the box index.

onDelete.name: onDelete
onDelete.description: Callback when the delete key is pressed. Returns the index of the box where delete was pressed.
